tag_list: mobile, strategy, international, finance, engineering, ma
overview:
Aneesh is the co-founder of FabriQate, an international mobile technology company working on mobile software. He was recently recognised by British Council as one of the Young Interactive Entrepreneurs in the digital sector in UK.

Aneesh looks after the product strategy and international expansion for FabriQate while based in their London office. Educated as an engineer, Aneesh also has a second degree in Finance allowing him to manage the commercial growth of technology led business. Prior to this Aneesh was at JPMorgan Investment Bank in their M&A practice in London and New York. Aneesh covered fast-growing sectors such as financial technology and payment systems including iconic transactions such as Jaguar-LandRover acquisition, Visa IPO, Synovus spin-out.

Aneesh has grown up across many countries which has given him an international outlook to life. He completed his higher education at Lehigh University, US and is a Tau Beta Pi member. He speaks 5 languages and currently resides in London. An avid traveller, he also enjoys thrill sports and culinary experiments. He is also actively involved with WWF Charity fund for saving white tigers.
